roleset.name: copy, as if following a pattern
roleset.note: PATTERN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pattern' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from pattern.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: This week, New York City announced [a 10-point policy]-1 patterned *trace*-1 on the federal bill of rights for taxpayers.
example.arg: on the federal bill of rights for taxpayers

example.name: active, different preposition
example.text: John patterned his behavior after Mary's less-violent tendencies.
